songs.title: Guilty Pleasure
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Baby boy, I'm automatic
Dripping on me, body static
Get your cameras, it's traumatic
Oh, you think I'm so dramatic?
Take my dirty secret
Don't care if you leak it
Watch me flip it, freak it
I dare you to keep it

[Pre-Chorus]
All the girls know
Boys know
Here for the show

[Chorus]
Just join us to look
Yeah, whatever (yeah, whatever)
Everybody knows I'm your guilty pleasure
Guilty pleasure, I like to lay in lace
A little leather (a little leather)
Know you wanna taste my guilty pleasure
You know there's nothing better
I am your guilty pleasure

[Verse 2]
Do it to me, do it right
Tie the knots and tie 'em tight
All the freaks are up to night
Let's go freak 'em out tonight
If you are attractive
Baby, take me captive
I'm radioactive
Boy, you better act quick

[Pre-Chorus]
All the girls know
Boys know
Here for the show

[Chorus]
Just join us to look
Yeah, whatever (yeah, whatever)
Everybody knows I'm your guilty pleasure
Guilty pleasure, I like to lay in lace
A little leather (a little leather)
Know you wanna taste my guilty pleasure
You know there's nothing better
I am your guilty pleasure

[Refrain]
You know there's nothing better
I am your guilty pleasure
You know there's nothing better
I am your guilty pleasure

[Bridge]
Want to get a taste
You want more, more
More, more
So, don't be ashamed
Lock the door, door
Door, door
It's dramatic
You want more, more
More, more

[Chorus]
Just join us to look
Yeah, whatever (yeah, whatever)
Everybody knows I'm your guilty pleasure
Guilty pleasure, I like to lay in lace
A little leather (a little leather)
Know you wanna taste my guilty pleasure
You know there's nothing better
I am your guilty pleasure

[Outro]
I am your guilty pleasure
I am your guilty pleasure
